name: Slimey Slimes (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can destroy 1 "Jam Breeding Machine" you control and 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.
Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, if you Special Summoned "Revival Jam" by it's own effect this turn, draw 3 cards.
